body.p:
Videos can be included and played in all HTML5-based output formats (like WebHelp). For example, to add a YouTube video in the WebHelp output generated from a DITA topic, follow these steps:
edit the DITA topic to refer the video using an object element like in the following example:<object outputclass="video"> <param name="src" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch/v/VideoName"/> </object>
execute a WebHelp or WebHelp with Feedback transformation scenario to obtain the output
